feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Cloud
feed.subtitle: ABAP Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: ATC Cloud readiness
entry.content:
I tried integrating the cloudification repository with my custom atc variant through the following link
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SAP/abap-atc-cr-cv-s4hc/main/src/objectReleaseInfoLatest.json
I added the above link in the configs for the atc 

But since the json present in the above link has multiple checks like BAPI's,DTEL's,FM's and since i only wanted the checks for deprecated tables I thought of creating a custom SICF service which will filter the JSON from the above endpoint and return a modified json containing only the checks for deprecated tables but when I went ahead and pasted the url of my SICF service in the config section i got the following error 

Can this be fixed or is there any other way to get the result that i want.

Thanks

entry.title: Please tell me how to create an ABAP project in Eclipse and connect it to the S/4 HANA Cloud develop
entry.content:
I am looking for a way to create an ABAP project and connect to the S/4 HANA Cloud development environment. If there is a website that describes the specific creation method, please let me know.

*The ABAP environment has been set up in Eclipse.

entry.title: Error when creating a ABAP project in Eclipse for S/4 Hana public cloud development environment
entry.content:
Currently, I am creating an ABAP project in Eclipse for  s/4 Hana public cloud development environment. As a result of following the method described in (detailed procedure), a connection error occurred. Please tell me the specific way to address this issue. 

 

(detailed procedure)

1.In the File menu, choose New > ABAP Project.

 

2.Choose one from the list and clicked 「Next >」

3.In Connection Settings, Entered like below.
*The IP address has been identified through a ping check.

 

4.In Logon to System,Entered like below.

entry.title: SAP public cloud app get selection row
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I added a button to the List Report generated by RAP using the BAS Development Guide. How can I get the selected row data?

I added a button to the Object generated by RAP using the BAS Development Guide. How can I get the selected row data?

 

 

Thanks advance

entry.title: Public Cloud Alternative for FM DDIF_FIELDINFO_GET?
entry.content:
I am not allowed to select from table dd03l, I tried to create a CDS on it too.
but for both I am given the error, "The use of table dd03l is not permitted".
and I can't use FM DDIF_FIELDINFO_GET.

What options are there, I need to identify table field datatype.
Thanks.

entry.title: Hide/Disable the Select option range in extension
entry.content:
TYPE-POOLS : scarr.
TABLES: scarr.

DATA: wa_res TYPE sscr_restrict,
wa_option_list TYPE sscr_opt_list,
wa_ass TYPE sscr_ass.

INITIALIZATION.
PERFORM initialization.

FORM initialization .
DATA: lv_program TYPE sy-repid,
wa_restriction TYPE sscr_restrict.

lv_program = sy-repid.
wa_option_list-name = 'S_TOEML'.
wa_option_list-options-eq = 'X'.
APPEND wa_option_list TO wa_res-opt_list_tab.

wa_option_list-name = 'S_CCEML'.
wa_option_list-options-eq = 'X'.
APPEND wa_option_list TO wa_res-opt_list_tab.

wa_ass-kind = 'S'.
wa_ass-name = 'S_TOEML'.
wa_ass-sg_main = 'I'.
wa_ass-op_main = 'S_TOEML'.
APPEND wa_ass TO wa_res-ass_tab.

wa_ass-kind = 'S'.
wa_ass-name = 'S_CCEML'.
wa_ass-sg_main = 'I'.
wa_ass-op_main = 'S_CCEML'.
APPEND wa_ass TO wa_res-ass_tab.
*wa_restriction

CALL FUNCTION 'SELECT_OPTIONS_RESTRICT'
EXPORTING
program = sy-repid
restriction = wa_res
* DB = ' '
EXCEPTIONS
too_late = 1
repeated = 2
selopt_without_options = 3
selopt_without_signs = 4
invalid_sign = 5
empty_option_list = 6
invalid_kind = 7
repeated_kind_a = 8
OTHERS = 9.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno
WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4 DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
ENDIF.
ENDFORM.

entry.title: Attachment issue in Delivery
entry.content:
Hi,

We have an interface which is used to upload pdf file to the delivery (attachment list), everything is fine in the code level, it is not throwing an error, and the file is stored in table TOAAT but file is not displaying in the attachment list. Please share your valuable thoughts.

Regards,

ravi

entry.title: Is it safe to switch from "Standard ABAP" to "ABAP for Cloud Development" if it compiles?
entry.content:
I'd like to prepare the custom code to be compatible with S/4HANA Public Cloud by switching the ABAP Language Version from  "Standard ABAP" to "ABAP for Cloud Development".

With the syntax check, I get partial information about which code needs to be rewritten (replacing BKPF with I_JOURNALENTRY, etc.)

For now, I don't want to run ATC checks for cloud-ready development, I'll do them later.

Without going to S/4HANA Public Cloud yet, if one program needs no modification, is it safe to not test it and keep the ABAP Language Version "ABAP for Cloud Development" in S/4HANA on premises?

Thanks.

Sandra

entry.title: Service Binding: Error during compilation.
entry.content:
Hi All,

On creation of  Service Binding  in Eclipse ADT - I Checked the underlying Views and Behavior Definition. It is not showing any Problem. 

Error during compilation - See next line for details. Error in entity 'ZS4T1_C_KUNDE(CDS)': Behavior definition for 'ZS4T1_C_KUNDE' has syntax errors.

Behavior Definition - As follows

managed implementation in class zbp_s4t1_r_kunden unique;

strict ( 2 );

 

define behavior for ZS4T1_R_KUNDEN alias customers

persistent table zs4t1_kunde

lock master

authorization master ( instance )

//etag master <field_name>

early numbering

{

create( authorization : global );

update;

delete;

 

field ( readonly ) Kunnr;

association _Orders { create; }

 

mapping for zs4t1_kunde

{

Kunnr = kunnr;

Name = name;

Vorname = vorname;

Firma = firma;

Str = str;

Stadt = stadt;

Land = land;

Pstl = pstl;

Sperre = sperre;

Adatum = adatum;

Fax = fax;

Telefon = telefon;

Email = email;

Url = url;

Sprache = sprache;

Bname = bname;

Passwort = passwort;

MemoTxt = memo_txt;

CurrencyCode = currency_code;

ZzumsatzZec = zzumsatz_zec;

ZzbcountZec = zzbcount_zec;

createdBy = created_by;

createdAt = created_at;

lastchangedBy = last_changed_by;

lastchangedAt = last_changed_at;

changedAt = changed_at;

}

}

 

define behavior for ZS4T1_R_PORDERS alias Orders

persistent table zs4t1_puroders

lock dependent by _kunde

authorization dependent by _kunde

//etag master <field_name>

{

update;

delete;

field ( readonly ) Kunnr, Orderid;

association _kunde;

mapping for zs4t1_puroders

{

Kunnr = kunnr;

Orderid = orderid;

Bdatum = bdatum;

Bsumme = bsumme;

CurrencyCode = currency_code;

Rabatt = rabatt;

Bstatus = bstatus;

Info = info;

createdBy = created_by;

createdAt = created_at;

LastChangedBy = last_changed_by;

LastChangedAt = last_changed_at;

changedAt = changed_at;

}

}

 

Regards

Shobhan

entry.title: Making Fields Mandatory in "Managing Purchasing Info Record" App (Private Cloud Edition)
entry.content: As per Document # 3497433 - Making Fields Mandatory in "Managing Purchasing Info Record" App is not possible in S4 Hana Public cloud edition. However would like to check if that is an option available for Private Could Edition (FPS03) and the steps to achieve this. Basically the requirement is to make two fields (available from and available to) as mandatory in the Manage Purchasing Info Record (App ID: F1982) app. This should also be work/reflected for any backend or mass upload tool for PIR creation.

entry.title: RAP Behaviour Implementation get_*_features/get_*_authorization : Should reported really get filled?
entry.content:
Hi RAP'lers,

the RAP Behaviour Implementation methods get_global_features, get_global_authorizations, get_instance_features, get_instance_authorizations have a changing parameter reported.

Is it really needed to fill this parameter? What is expected in this parameters? Where/when are they shown to the user in a Fiori Elements App?

If they should get filled, what would be the best approach?

The implementation eg in bp_demo_unmanaged_root_draft does not seem to be a sensible approach to me.

Thanks for some hints here,

  Wolfgang

entry.title: Direct insert of entries into CDS while creating new PO or contract in ABAP cloud
entry.content:
Hi,

While searching for purchase order creation through ABAP cloud, I came across a blog https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/abap-s4hanacloud-procurement-purchasereq-contract.html . 

In this blog, PO is created directly using Purchaseorder entity rather than BAPI or using any API service.  Am just wondering if this can take care of changelogs and triggering of workflows like BAPIs.

Thanks,

entry.title: Can't create Transport Request for my new ABAP Cloud Package
entry.content:
Hello,

I am currently going through Learning the Basics of ABAP Programming on SAP BTP and I am attempting to create a package as shown in the lesson Running Software Structure and Logistics in order to then assign a Transport Request to it.

The third step in the "Create ABAP Package" window is different on my Eclipse than on the Eclipse from the demo, and when I click next the following problem arises:

"A top level package already exists for the software component ZLOCAL (PAK684)"

as shown in the following screenshot

IF in the first step of this window I select "ZLOCAL" as super package (just for the sake of trying) I do get to the menu for the new transport layer creation, but it is disabled as shown below.

Thanks in advance,

ivo

I'm getting the below errors while deploying the Developments. Please help me to resolve them. Thank you.

entry.title: 3rd level child in RAP managed scenario does not navigate to Identification facet
entry.content:
I used Parent->Child->Grandchild relationship in managed RAP Scenario and used the standard create, update, delete. I created V4 UI Service binding and checked the Preview.  All the navigation works except from the 3rd level. When I select one row of Grandchild, it does not show the Identification facet. This issue is not there in V2 UI Service.

Here is the behavior definition and Metadata extension screenshots.

managed implementation in class zbp_i_school unique;
//strict;
with draft;

define behavior for ZI_SCHOOL alias schooldetails
persistent table zschool_det
draft table zschool_det_d

lock master total etag lastchangeddate
authorization master ( instance )
etag master locallastchangeddate
{
  create;
  update;
  delete;

  draft action Activate optimized;
  draft action Discard;
  draft action Edit;
  draft action Resume;
  draft determine action Prepare;


  field ( readonly : update ) SchoolId;
  action ( features : instance ) setOpenStatus result [1] $self;

  association _zchild { create; with draft; }


  mapping for zschool_det
    {
      SchoolId   = school_id;
      SchoolName = school_name;
      Location   = location;
      Medium     = medium;
      OpenNow    = open_now;
    }
}

define behavior for ZI_STUDENT alias studentBD
authorization dependent by _zparent
persistent table zstudent_det
draft table zstudent_det_d
lock dependent by _zparent
{

  update;
  delete;

  association _zparent { with draft; }
  association _zgchild { create; with draft; }


  field ( readonly : update ) SchoolId;
  field ( readonly : update ) StudentId;

  mapping for zstudent_det
    {
      StudentId   = student_id;
      SchoolId    = school_id;
      StudentName = student_name;
      Birthdate   = birthdate;
    }
}

define behavior for ZI_SCORE alias scoreBD
authorization dependent by _zparent
persistent table zscore_det
draft table zscore_det_d
lock dependent by _zparent
{

  update;
  delete;

  association _zchild { with draft; }
  association _zparent { with draft; }

  field ( readonly : update ) SchoolId;
  field ( readonly : update ) StudentId;
  field ( readonly : update ) SubjectId;
  field ( readonly : update ) Class;

  mapping for zscore_det
    {
      Class       = class;
      SchoolId    = school_id;
      StudentId   = student_id;
      SubjectId   = subject_id;
      SubjectName = subject_name;
      Marks       = marks;
    }

}
@Metadata.layer: #CORE

@UI: { headerInfo: { typeName: 'Subject', typeNamePlural: 'Subjects',
                     title: { type: #STANDARD, label: 'Subject Det Title', value: 'SubjectName' } } }
annotate view ZC_SCORE with
{

  .facet: [ { position: 10, label: 'Score Detail', purpose: #STANDARD,
                     type: #IDENTIFICATION_REFERENCE } ]


  : { lineItem: [{ position: 10, label: 'Subject ID' }],
                      identification: [{ position: 10, label: 'Subject ID'  }]  }
  SubjectId;

  : { lineItem: [{ position: 20, label: 'Class' }],
                      identification: [{ position: 20, label: 'Class'  }]  }
  Class;

  : { lineItem: [{ position: 30, label: 'Student ID' }],
                      identification: [{ position: 30, label: 'Student ID'  }]  }
  StudentId;


  : { lineItem: [{ position: 40, label: 'School ID' }],
                      identification: [{ position: 40, label: 'School ID'  }]  }
  SchoolId;

  : { lineItem: [{ position: 50, label: 'Subject Name' }],
                      identification: [{ position: 50, label: 'Subject Name'  }]  }
  SubjectName;


  : { lineItem: [{ position: 60, label: 'Score' }],
                      identification: [{ position: 60, label: 'Score'  }]  }
  Marks;

}

Please let me know what I am missing? Let me know if you need more code details.

entry.title: Not able to update Issuing Storage Location - RESLO - field during PR Creation using BO interface
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We’ve built a custom app on SAP Public Cloud using the RAP framework and the Business Object interface I_PURCHASEREQUISITIONTP.

The app enables the creation of stock transfer purchase requisitions between logical storage locations within the same plant, using item category "U".

However, we need to populate the field "Issuing Storage Location – RESLO", which currently does not appear to be available in the Business Object interface, nor accessible via any custom logic options we’ve explored.

Does anyone have experience or suggestions to help us manage this situation?

Thanks

Caterina

entry.title: Custom Entity as ABAP Cloud form data provider leading entity
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Can a ABAP RAP custom entity be used as a leading entity of a form data provider? I am working on embedded steampunk of S/4HANA Cloud 2508 version and have built a form object with a service definition where I have exposed a custom entity as a leading entity but the form object is erroring out.

I have added necessary annotations to service definition and the custom entity respectively. These annotations works for a CDS view entity but not for a custom entity or a CDS view defined using 'define view' syntax.

Does it mean that a custom entity cannot be used in form object?

@PascalBremer 

Best regards,

Sumit

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud RAP Custom entity unmanaged how to update?
entry.content:
Hi experts,

when i use custom entity,how can i update entity in unmanaged?
I just want update entity,don't update table.

 

 

Best regards
JamesG

entry.title: Double Periods (". . ") Not Throwing Syntax Error In ABAP.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am practicing ABAP and I have a small doubt regarding syntax.

In my code, I accidentally wrote:  IF sy-subrc = 0.
WRITE: 'Success'.
ENDIF..   

or at any ending statement if i give dot after the dot ( .. ), it gives me no syntax error and successfully activated the program. 

Is this expected behavior in ABAP? Why doesn’t the system flag this as an error?
Would appreciate if someone could clarify the reasoning behind this.

Thanks in advance!
